name: Depth of Decay V2.0
description:
This is a new version of my IP Depth of Decay! 

Version 2.0 Features:

- Directional movement animations

- New Transform ability

- Combo Attacks

- FOG WALLS!!!! (For that Souls game feel!!!)

- A boss... With 3 Phases

- New map level, Designed to act as a starting area. 

-Prospects of being further developed!
(I aim to make more levels, Enimes, Bosses, weapons and much much more!!!)

I hope you enjoy!
